TotalJobs.description: The total number of Grid jobs known to the system

RunningJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs which are running in an ExecutionEnvironment

WaitingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs which are waiting to start executing

StagingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs staging files before or after execution

SuspendedJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs that started to execute, but are now suspended

PreLRMSWaitingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs managed by the Grid software, but not yet passed to the LRMS
